jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
The Growth Manager will manage a team of Growth Leads and Growth Analysts and collaborate with Product Manager, Marketing, Research, and Creative to execute solutions focused on improving acquisition, activation, retention, or loyalty for our every Product. The ideal candidate is an experienced data-driven business person which equal parts of Product Manager, Growth Marketer, and Business Strategist. They start from business strategy, customer experience and delve into writing campaign briefs or experiment designs that encourage our users to experience the Product’s core value as quickly as possible. We're looking for someone who gets out of bed every day thinking about new ways to grow the business, and who works in exponents vs. increments.

Ideal candidates are process-oriented, results-driven, and problem-solving self-starters. They have a strong sense of responsibility and ownership. They have experience with loyalty, incentives and have strategic ideas on driving consumer experience via user psychology, UI/UX changes, gamification, and content marketing. Succeed to manage the team to deliver results and can manage collaboration with all stakeholders. This role will provide an opportunity to greatly impact the homepage of GO-JEK and how we personalize user experiences globally.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Discover growth opportunities in the product from funnel conversion rates and user experience by exploring transaction data, customer activity within apps and actual customer insightsDrives the prioritization, strategy, and focus on solutions to solve user problems
  • Manage and prioritize experiment ideas based on Impact, Confidence, and Effort (ICE) scores testing and validate solutions through proper experimentation process
  • Summarize results and communicate learnings to the product team
  • Plan and scale-up solutions which consist of content, communication, vouchers, and promotion or product changes
  • Deliver with high attention to detail and accuracy
  • Take ownership of KPIs related to Activation, Engagement, or Retention within the product funnel by maximizing user acquisition and conversion rates. And also maintain timelines to iterate and scale up new solutions based on experimental results
  • Performing retroactive analysis of new solutions to evaluate their impact on GO-JEK's North Star Metrics. And also proactively review the experiment process in the team and act on how to drive faster experimentation process
  • Present findings to senior management to drive business and strategic decision-making on feature prioritization and impact analysis

• BS/MS in Business, Engineering, Computer Science, Math, Economics, Statistics, or equivalent experience
  • Minimum 5 years of working experience with 1 year of leadership experience
  • A creative design-thinking and problem-solving mindset that can work in increments and exponents
  • Strong team player; possessing team synergy skills with a high level of enthusiasm in collaborating in cross-functional teams. Can also balance attention to detail with swift execution
  • Strong project management skills to manage complex projects, also can manage and prioritize multiple internal and external stakeholders
  • Strong business acumen with successful experience influencing and leading cross-functional teams
  • Proficiency with multiple analytic and database tools common within a marketing organization (e.g., Clevertap, Tableau, etc.) with good knowledge of SQL and experimentation process
  • Hustle is essential, moving quickly and executing to allow for continual iteration is a core competency of our team
